title: About Me
description: Full Stack Developer and Web Designer based in Dublin, Ireland, with a background in Computer Science and a Bachelor’s Degree in Digital Marketing. My expertise lies in developing and maintaining responsive, user-friendly interfaces using technologies like React. My professional experience includes roles at AWS and Meta, where I specialized in technical customer support, troubleshooting complex issues, and delivering effective solutions to global clients. As a freelancer, I have completed numerous projects focused on creating scalable, high-performing web applications.
